data.title: Draft Version of Discography
data.text:
Draft Version of Connie Francis Discography

This is a very large document. There are numerous spelling errors and the listing has not been completely proofread.

This rough draft of discography is only listed here to show that Connie is such a wonderful singer that hundreds of thousands of millions of people have bought her music.
